metadata.name: Lost In Carnival #1/4
metadata.description:
"Lost in Carnival" is an intriguing art piece that captures the essence of a lively and colourful carnival scene. The illustration features a busy street lined with vibrant stalls and adorned with rides. I have tried to skill-fully capture the atmosphere of a carnival with the use of bold, mandarin colours, and dynamic lines.
At the centre of the illustration, we see few people, seemingly lost in the hustle and bustle of the carnival. They are surrounded by a sea of people, each engaged in their own activities and pursuits.I have tried to pay close attention to the details, capturing the intricate designs of the carnival costumes, the intricate patterns on the stalls, and the people. The overall effect is a captivating illustration that transports the viewer to the heart of a carnival, where they too can get lost in the magic of the moment.
